Best

Paul

messages.subject: R: [samuraihistory] 2007 Shinsaku-meito ten
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Paul. Great news. Can I post your information, with full credit to you, on Swordforum International ? ... Da: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
messages.messageBody:
Hi Paul. Great news. Can I post your information, with full credit to
you, on Swordforum International ?

-----Messaggio originale-----
Da: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
[mailto:samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com] Per conto di Paul Martin
Inviato: mercoledì 31 maggio 2006 15.13
A: token_kenkyu_kai@...
Oggetto: [samuraihistory] 2007 Shinsaku-meito ten

Ok Folks

we have some early results coming in.

Takamatsu Award Matsuda Tsuguyasu

Other rumoured Tokusho winners include Kubo Yoshihiro, Kawasaki Akihira
and
Takami Kuniichi.

Also, someone else recently asked who is making blades for Ise shrine. I

believe that I heard Amata sensei is making a sword and Ono Yoshimitsu
is
making a spear.

Best

P







---
Samurai Archives: http://www.samurai-archives.com
Samurai Archives store: http://www.cafeshops.com/samuraiarchives
---

messages.msgSnippet: Ok Folks we have some early results coming in. Takamatsu Award Matsuda Tsuguyasu Other rumoured Tokusho winners include Kubo Yoshihiro, Kawasaki Akihira and
messages.messageBody:
Ok Folks

we have some early results coming in.

Takamatsu Award Matsuda Tsuguyasu

Other rumoured Tokusho winners include Kubo Yoshihiro, Kawasaki Akihira and
Takami Kuniichi.

Also, someone else recently asked who is making blades for Ise shrine. I
believe that I heard Amata sensei is making a sword and Ono Yoshimitsu is
making a spear.

Best

P
